title: Drawing, "Entrance Gate to a Villa", 1775
medium:
Graphite, gray wash, partial ruled border in graphi
Support: cream laid paper
markings: Marks: similar to left part of Churchill 433
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink from lower center to lower right: Giuseppe Valadier Romano 1775
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Entrance Gate to a Villa", 1775.
1775. Graphite, gray wash, partial ruled border in graphi
Support: cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-1000.
